text.name: info4
text.text: A simulated retro game console, which can be programmed in the classic BASIC language.

text.name: info5
text.text: Built-in features : Gfx Designer for editing sprites, tiles, fonts and maps, as

text.name: info6
text.text: well as the Sound Composer for music and sound effects.

text.name: info7
text.text: Display : 160x128 pixels, 60 Hz, 8 dynamic 6-bit palettes with 4 colors each

text.name: info9
text.text: Sound : 4 voices, saw/tri/pulse/noise, pulse width, volume, ADSR, LFO
